topic.title: History Of Past Illness Section - conformance rules

section.p: This section describes the history related to the patient's current complaints, problems, or diagnoses. It records the historical details leading up to and pertaining to the patient's current complaint or reason for seeking medical care.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="11348-0" HISTORY OF PAST ILLNESS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] problemObservation (CONF:8792)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Problem Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.4)
